thread.title: Great boutique hotel in the heart of NY
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel in the heart of NY - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jasminrogers
title: Great boutique hotel in the heart of NY
text:
Staff was very friendly and eager to please, from the doorman, to the front desk agent, housekkeepers and servers.Enjoyed evening cocktails with the cheese and fruit. Asked for coffee maker in our room and it came so fast.
Great start to a wonderful city.
